bit_field_value.name: PCR_ISF_0b1
bit_field_value.description: Configured interrupt is detected. If the pin is configured to generate a DMA request, then the corresponding flag will be cleared automatically at the completion of the requested DMA transfer. Otherwise, the flag remains set until a logic 1 is written to the flag. If the pin is configured for a level sensitive interrupt and the pin remains asserted, then the flag is set again immediately after it is cleared.

bit_field_value.name: PCR_IRQC_0b1100
bit_field_value.description: ISF flag and Interrupt when logic 1.

bit_field_value.name: PCR_ISF_0b0
bit_field_value.description: Configured interrupt is not detected.

bit_field_value.name: PCR_ISF_0b1
bit_field_value.description: Configured interrupt is detected. If the pin is configured to generate a DMA request, then the corresponding flag will be cleared automatically at the completion of the requested DMA transfer. Otherwise, the flag remains set until a logic 1 is written to the flag. If the pin is configured for a level sensitive interrupt and the pin remains asserted, then the flag is set again immediately after it is cleared.

bit_field_value.name: PCR_PS_0b0
bit_field_value.description: Internal pulldown resistor is enabled on the corresponding pin, if the corresponding PE field is set.

bit_field_value.name: PCR_PS_0b1
bit_field_value.description: Internal pullup resistor is enabled on the corresponding pin, if the corresponding PE field is set.

bit_field_value.name: PCR_PE_0b0
bit_field_value.description: Internal pullup or pulldown resistor is not enabled on the corresponding pin.

bit_field_value.name: PCR_PE_0b1
bit_field_value.description: Internal pullup or pulldown resistor is enabled on the corresponding pin, if the pin is configured as a digital input.

bit_field_value.name: PCR_MUX_0b000
bit_field_value.description: Pin disabled (Alternative 0) (analog).

bit_field_value.name: PCR_MUX_0b001
bit_field_value.description: Alternative 1 (GPIO).

bit_field_value.description: Alternative 2 (chip-specific).

bit_field_value.description: Alternative 3 (chip-specific).

bit_field_value.name: PCR_MUX_0b110
bit_field_value.description: Alternative 6 (chip-specific).

bit_field_value.name: PCR_MUX_0b111
bit_field_value.description: Alternative 7 (chip-specific).

bit_field_value.name: PCR_LK_0b0

bit_field_value.name: PCR_LK_0b1
bit_field_value.description: Pin Control Register fields [15:0] are locked and cannot be updated until the next system reset.

If the pin is configured to generate a DMA request, then the corresponding flag will be cleared automatically at the completion of the requested DMA transfer. bit_field_value.name: DFER_DFE_0b00000000000000000000000000000000
bit_field_value.description: Digital filter is disabled on the corresponding pin and output of the digital filter is reset to zero.
